details.Restrictions: This application is open source licensed, BSD-2 Clause.

interface.name: SiteId
interface.description: SiteId to be tracked, otherwise it will default to use '1'

interface.name: default SiteId
interface.description: set a possibly sane default SiteId

interface.name: Tracker URL (REQUIRED)
interface.description: A receiver URL 'https://'. Should be utilizing SSL for security purposes but using a schemeless URL '//host.tld' is valid also. Leaving empty will use '/piwik/piwik.php'

interface.name: Default Tracker URL (REQUIRED)
interface.description: A default receiver URL 'https://'. Should be utilizing SSL for security purposes but using a schemeless URL '//host.tld' is valid also.

interface.name: Use cdnjs?
interface.description: Try using cdnjs for quickly serving the latest 'piwik.js' library to your visitors?

interface.name: default piwik.js location
interface.description:
A piwik.js URL schemeless '//' or 'http://' or 'https://'.
Leaving this empty will possibly break stuff so be sure this url is valid! Prefer to use latest piwik.js from cdnjs.com, you're welcome.

interface.name: piwik.js location
interface.description:
A piwik.js URL schemeless '//' or 'http://' or 'https://'.
Leaving this empty will default to use piwik.js from cdnjs.com or from '/piwik/piwik.js'

interface.name: Link Tracking
interface.description:
You should want this to be enabled as it is by default.
Equivalent to "_paq.push(['enableLinkTracking',true]);"

interface.name: Whether or not to obey the browser do not track.
interface.description: Enable or disable obeying browser do not track options. Equivalent to "_paq.push(['setDoNotTrack',true]);"

interface.name: Debugger
interface.description: Enable or disable the logging, and errors debug output to the Javascript console. Leave this disabled unless you are having issues and would like to know more.

description: Codename: Miniature Hipster. A Piwik Analytics CloudFlare application that helps speed things up. Click "Setup" to modify your tracking options
name: Piwik Analytics
